Uses of Package
org.elasticsearch.index.codec

  • Packages that use org.elasticsearch.index.codec 
    Package Description
    org.elasticsearch.index.codec  
    org.elasticsearch.index.engine.internal  
    org.elasticsearch.index.shard.service  
    org.elasticsearch.index.store  
  • Classes in org.elasticsearch.index.codec used by org.elasticsearch.index.codec 
    Class and Description
    CodecModule
    The CodecModule creates and loads the CodecService, PostingsFormatService and DocValuesFormatService, allowing low level data-structure specialization on a Lucene Segment basis.
  • Classes in org.elasticsearch.index.codec used by org.elasticsearch.index.engine.internal 
    Class and Description
    CodecService
    Since Lucene 4.0 low level index segments are read and written through a codec layer that allows to use use-case specific file formats & data-structures per field.
  • Classes in org.elasticsearch.index.codec used by org.elasticsearch.index.shard.service 
    Class and Description
    CodecService
    Since Lucene 4.0 low level index segments are read and written through a codec layer that allows to use use-case specific file formats & data-structures per field.
  • Classes in org.elasticsearch.index.codec used by org.elasticsearch.index.store 
    Class and Description
    CodecService
    Since Lucene 4.0 low level index segments are read and written through a codec layer that allows to use use-case specific file formats & data-structures per field.
